document.full_text: a court dismissed the case against a policewoman accused of slapping the tunisian street vendor whose subsequent self-immolation set off revolts across tunisia and the arab world.
document.title: case against tunisian police officer is dismissed
lines_and_colors: a court dismissed the case against a policewoman accused of slapping the tunisian street vendor whose subsequent self-immolation set off revolts across tunisia and the arab world.
